title: Seamless integration with favorite tools
description: With ConnectMore, you can easily integrate with the essential tool that you already use, which eventually makes your email marketing more impactful. By using ConnectMore, you can sync your data with your customer relation management and can integrate your analytics and e-commerce platform.

points.title: CRM integration
points.description: Sync your essential contacts with tools like HubSpot, Zoho, and Salesforce.

points.title: Analytics integration
points.description: Combine ConnectMore analytics with platforms like Google Analytics.

points.title: Ecommerce integration
points.description: Inform potential users about the company and products based on purchase behavior.
